name: Equal Exchange Organic Breakfast Blend - Whole Coffee Beans
categories: Organic Breakfast Blend - Whole Coffee Beans
description:
A smooth blend of medium roast and dark French roast beans, with a gentle and balanced flavour profile. These Organic Breakfast Blend beans are ready for you to transform them into the perfect cup of coffee. Equal Exchanges is part of a worker owned co-operative that works directly with farmers.Gentle medium French roast blend balances richness and caffeine levels.Tasting notes of smooth vanilla, rich milk chocolate, sweet caramel and fresh citrus.Kosher Pareve certified by the Orthodox Union.
